channel.title: Proelium-Pk || Perfected The Pk Server || Lumby Pvp
channel.description:
[ul][CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bodIXPF.png[/img]
[CENTER][B][color="#FFA500"]Proelium-Pk has arrived! We are now a lumbridge pk server, with a twist of eco as well. Most basic items can be obtained easily in the shops in the lumbridge castle, that is what can get you started off, you can then easily from there obtain better items from pking and getting drops, or from saving up pk points. Our main focus is pking and most of the server evolves around it, but as you can see in the images below, we offer much more than just pking. Most pk servers people get tired or bored of pking all day long, so with that in mind, we proudly present our brand new content. We have all skills that are fully working and most of them have been redone from scratch. Neitiznot island is scattered with all the skilling necessities that you need. We also have 10 bosses that drop a wide range of items that are not found in the pkpoint store or in the donator store, giving a good boost to the economy and offering more of a challenge throughout the game. If your still bored we have five custom unique minigames, that are sure to please all you. In the pictures below I will be showing you all of our main features that we offer.[/COLOR][/B][/CENTER]
[B][COLOR="Navy"] [URL=http://"http://proelium-pk.com/newlanding/"]Home Page[/URL] [URL=http://"http://proelium-pk.com/index.php"]Forums![/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.proelium-pk.com/client/play.html"]Play Now![/URL] [URL=http://"http://proelium-pk.com/client/Play%20Proelium%20Pk.rar"]Download![/URL] [/COLOR][/CENTER][/B]
[B][COLOR="orange"]Some features:[/COLOR][/B] [LIST=] [*]Working EP System [*]New combaticons working 100% [*]New hitmarks [*]Amzing fullscreen, one of the best [*]Working clan wars [*]Working 100% quik prayers [*]Worlwide skilling [*]All skills working [*]New bosses such as Seat troll and barrelchest [*]Kalphite queen morphing [*]Almost All current runescape items [*]634 Content [*]Pest Control [*]Fight Arena [*]Flawless switching [*]Working Rune essence mining area [*]3 level slayer tower [*]Working bank tabs [*]100% ALL curse prayers [*]Leeches working 100% [*]Working hand cannon w/ special [*]Working xp counter [*]Auto donation system [*]Vote for rewards system [*]Overload's [*]Npc clipping 100% [*]Player clipping 100% [*]Autocast without staff [*]Korasi sword [*]SOL working special attack [*]All dupes patched [*]Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched [*]Can hold 600 players no lag (tested) [*]Hiscores [*]New agility courses [*]Identical runescape clan chat [*]New bork boss [*]New bandits training area [*]Flawless Switching [*]New client - 150k memory, very light (functions on all OS's) [*]Clan Wars - Working invites/barriers/timers/interfaces/wins + losses [*]Zombies Minigame [*]Pvp artifacts drops (exchange for gold at mandrith) [*]New pk titles, costs kills [*]2 pk point shop [*]Flawless pk point farming system [*]Herblore is 100% like runescape (redone) [*]Duel Tournaments minigame 100% [*]New weapon minigame (upgrades, bonus's classes etc) [*]Lottery system [*]Level up status by clicking the combat icon [*]Tutorial system [*]Pvp zones around the map and pvp levels [*]Kills and deaths displayed on highscores [*]MUCH MORE.[/ul]
[SPOILER=Media] [CENTER][B][COLOR="Orange"]Some Media[/COLOR][/B]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]Identical RS clan chat, works 100%[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/y1jut.png[/img]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]New Clan Wars Minigame![/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/C5kILOq.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/rOd0QS7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/m95obgl.png[/img]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]New Duel Tournaments Minigame![/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YojkELc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TZRyIEA.png[/img]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]New Weapon Minigame! (credits to pb for the somewhat idea and map)[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/O4eXEXf.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mTc6679.png[/img] (Classes, upgrades, items, potential, ffa, much more)
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]Improved Fight Pits[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MkbmpLD.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/R4mhc9Q.png[/img]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]Custom Zombies Minigame![/SIZE][/B][/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G0Cppl6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G03aPw8.png[/img]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]Some bosses (10 in-game, dropping items only from bossing)[/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OU0ns.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/JfGnWrl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/f6DGIfG.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HyH6N.png[/img]
[COLOR="Orange"][B][SIZE="2"]Misc. Images![/SIZE][/B][/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cV4eB.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5fJedev.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Vhf6dlI.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ia6McFN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1YHz6wi.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/NtWc9jj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ILEPZOt.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sj6XhkT.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YeiKcgH.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vmMwulF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ulMAgB6.png[/img][/CENTER][/SPOILER]
Hope to see you all in-game!

item.description:
@Tylers_Pur31 wrote:

g0d of war1:

Nice server you got there

Thanks.

Also, Item switching is now flawless. You will no longer miss equipping items within a cycle. The same applies for food and potions. F keys have also been updated to the current ones. Thanks to Eliminate for real f keys.

Don’t believe me? Come online and try it

Read full topic

@Tylers_Pur31 wrote:

[ul][CENTER]

[CENTER][color="#FFA500"]Proelium-Pk has arrived! We are now a lumbridge pk server, with a twist of eco as well. Most basic items can be obtained easily in the shops in the lumbridge castle, that is what can get you started off, you can then easily from there obtain better items from pking and getting drops, or from saving up pk points. Our main focus is pking and most of the server evolves around it, but as you can see in the images below, we offer much more than just pking. Most pk servers people get tired or bored of pking all day long, so with that in mind, we proudly present our brand new content. We have all skills that are fully working and most of them have been redone from scratch. Neitiznot island is scattered with all the skilling necessities that you need. We also have 10 bosses that drop a wide range of items that are not found in the pkpoint store or in the donator store, giving a good boost to the economy and offering more of a challenge throughout the game. If your still bored we have five custom unique minigames, that are sure to please all you. In the pictures below I will be showing you all of our main features that we offer.[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[COLOR=“Navy”]
Home Page
Forums!
Play Now!
Download!
[/COLOR][/CENTER]

[COLOR=“orange”]Some features:[/COLOR]
[LIST=]
[]Working EP System
[]New combaticons working 100%
[]New hitmarks
[]Amzing fullscreen, one of the best
[]Working clan wars
[]Working 100% quik prayers
[]Worlwide skilling
[]All skills working

[]Overload’s

[]Player clipping 100%

[]Korasi sword
[]SOL working special attack
[]All dupes patched
[]Memory leak/Deadlocks have been patched
[]Can hold 600 players no lag (tested)
[]Hiscores
[]New agility courses
[]Identical runescape clan chat
[]New bork boss
[]New bandits training area
[]Flawless Switching
[]New client - 150k memory, very light (functions on all OS’s)
[]Clan Wars - Working invites/barriers/timers/interfaces/wins + losses
[]Zombies Minigame
[]Pvp artifacts drops (exchange for gold at mandrith)
[]New pk titles, costs kills
[]2 pk point shop
[]Flawless pk point farming system
[]Herblore is 100% like runescape (redone)
[]Duel Tournaments minigame 100%
[]New weapon minigame (upgrades, bonus’s classes etc)
[]Lottery system
[]Level up status by clicking the combat icon
[]Tutorial system
[]Pvp zones around the map and pvp levels
[]Kills and deaths displayed on highscores
[*]MUCH MORE.[/ul]
